source.name: encryption
source.text: To prevent data from being intercepted or stolen during transmission, it's important to use <<<encryption>>> when sending and receiving data to and from the ChatGPT API.
source.guidance: Encryption helps protect data from being intercepted or stolen by hackers or other malicious actors. It is especially important when data is transmitted over networks, where it could potentially be intercepted.

text: To prevent data from being intercepted or stolen during transmission, it's important to use
when sending and receiving data to and from the ChatGPT API.
